name: spo-get-entra-id-guest-users-with-elevated-permissions-m365
title: Get Azure AD (Entra ID) Guest Users with Elevated Permissions (M365)
shortDescription: Identify guest users within a Microsoft 365 tenant who have elevated permissions across various services such as Entra ID, Microsoft Teams, and SharePoint Online.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
